WebGL OES_element_index_uint Extension Draft Specification

Name

OES_element_index_uint

Contact

WebGL working group (public_webgl 'at' khronos.org)

Contributors

Florian BÃ¶sch (pyalot 'at' gmail.com)

Version

Last modified date: February 24, 2012
Revision: 3

Number

WebGL extension #10

Dependencies

Written against the WebGL API 1.0 specification.

Overview

This extension exposes the OES_element_index_uint functionality to WebGL. There are no WebGL-specific behavioral changes. Consult the above extension for documentation, issues, and new functions and enumerants.

When this extension is enabled:

  • The drawElements entry point parameter type accepts the value UNSIGNED_INT

Alias Name Strings (for draft extensions)

  • WEBKIT_OES_element_index_uint
  • MOZ_OES_element_index_uint

IDL

interface OES_element_index_uint {
};

Revision History

Revision 1, 2012/01/24

  • Initial revision.

Revision 2, 2012/01/27

  • Removed the bufferData requirement as this is not checked by webgl

Revision 3, 2012/02/24

  • Removed the enumerants from the IDL which are contained in the context and added aliases to the extension name
